## Source: ossf-package-analysis (25a92b8d02d9ea706cba7f9c449c35b0f6d1e5e9a21209ff42e734152e6f39bb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-6a88' @ 2.5.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
